articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Factories in Jagang Province
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Factories in Jagang Province
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to various industrial establishments in Jagang Province making leap forward to push back the frontiers of latest science.
					 The first leg of his guidance was the Kanggye General Tractor Plant, a model plant put on a CNC basis.
					
					 Going round different shops and products of the plant, he acquainted himself in detail with technological updating and production there.
					
					 He highly estimated the revolutionary work style and enterprising work approach of the officials, workers and technicians of the plant making uninterrupted innovations and advances, noting it is laudable that they have changed its appearance as required by the era of knowledge-based economy through a dynamic mass technological innovation movement and are stepping up the vigorous advance to hit the higher goal of latest science.
					
					 The plant is now capable of manufacturing machine products requiring high technology, he said, adding that this is a miracle wrought thanks to the indomitable mental power, work style and the Kanggye spirit of the people in Jagang Province who have grown remarkably stronger through the "Arduous March", the forced march.
					
					 Going round a duck farm built by the plant, he highly praised the officials of the plant for having provided the workers with good conditions for diet and cultural recreation. 
					
					 The plant set an example not only in modernization but in supply service for the workers and cultured practices in production and life, he said, stressing the need for all units to follow the experience of the plant.
					
					 He watched a fire-fighting drill conducted by the fire brigade of the plant with fire-fighting equipment manufactured by itself.
					
					 He put forward highly important tasks which would serve as guidelines for managing and operating the plant and boosting its production.
					
					 The next leg of his guidance was the Jangjagang Machine Tool Factory.
					
					 Making the rounds of various places of the factory, he got familiar in detail with the performance and principle of mechanism of CNC-based machine tools. He highly estimated the workers of the factory for their merits, expressing great satisfaction over the fact that they are mass-producing good machine products as required by the new century.
					
					 He said that the factory is one of the model factories demonstrating the proud appearance of the Juche-based industry. 
					
					 Noting that the country is now successfully manufacturing any latest machines if it has a will, he said with pride that this shining reality eloquently proves that the nation's Juche-based machine-building industry has proudly reached the world level of cutting-edge science and technology. 
					
					 He said that in order to manufacture more modern machine products as required by the new century the factory should continue channeling efforts into technological updating based on the latest technology for the purpose of putting production processes on a modern and precision basis and standardizing products on a higher level.
					
					 He set again the target to be attained by the factory in the near future, specified tasks and ways to do so and showed such great benevolence as unraveling knotty problems.
					
					 He had a photo session with the labor innovators of the factory.
					
					 The third leg of his guidance was the September Textile Mill.
					
					 Seeing historic mementoes and data displayed in the room devoted to its history, he recalled with deep emotion unforgettable days of history.
					
					 Noting that the mill has turned into the nation's leading textile producer thanks to the wise guidance and meticulous instructions of President Kim Il Sung, he stressed that the Korean people would always remember the profound loving care and benevolence of the President who worked heart and soul for solving the people's problem of clothing.
					
					 Going round Spinning Shop No. 3 and various other places of the mill, he acquainted himself in detail with the progress made in updating and production there.
					
					  Seeing the data on the efforts made by women of meritorious services who have sincerely worked at the mill for years, he estimated their feats. No women have added shine to their fame and existence as the women in the era of the Workers' Party did, he said, adding that this epoch-making change in the position and role of the women of the DPRK is a clear proof that they are a powerful force dynamically pushing forward the revolution and construction as they are strong in revolutionary spirit and militancy.
					
					 Making the rounds of the canteen newly built by the mill and other supply service facilities, he paid deep attention to the living of the workers.
					
					 He set forth highly important tasks to be carried out by the mill.
					
					 Noting that it is the steadfast resolution and will of the WPK to provide the people with better clothes, he stressed the need to direct bigger efforts to producing textile and bring about a new turn in settling the problem of clothing.
					
					  Supply service at the mill where women hold a majority is of special importance, he said, calling upon the party organization and officials of the mill to always pay deep attention to providing the women workers with good living conditions.
					
					 He enjoyed a performance given by members of the workers art group of the mill in the work place.
					
					 After enjoying the performance, he expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the revolutionary and militant workers of the DPRK are successfully discharging a vanguard role in creating new culture, too.
					
					 He expressed great expectation and conviction that the workers of the mill would make strenuous efforts to implement the Party's policy on bringing about a radical turn in the light industry and produce and supply more quality clothing materials and thus actively contribute to accomplishing the cause of building a thriving nation.
					
					 A dynamic drive for pushing back the frontiers of science and creating new standard and record is now under way at all factories and enterprises of Jagang Province, he said, calling upon the province to take the lead in carrying out the tasks of the technological revolution.
					
					 He was accompanied by Pak To Chun, chief secretary of the Jagang Provincial Committee of the WPK, Jang Song Thaek, vice-chairman of the NDC of the DPRK and department director of the WPK Central Committee, Kim Kyong Hui, Hong Sok Hyong and Thae Jong Su, department directors of the WPK Central Committee, and Ju Kyu Chang and Ri Jae Il, first vice department directors of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: 3rd DPRK-US Military Working Contact Held
articles.content:
3rd DPRK-US Military Working Contact Held
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The 3rd round of the DPRK-U.S. senior colonel-level military working contact took place at Panmunjom on Friday to probe the truth about the "Cheonan" case.
					 The DPRK side branded the proposal for creating a "joint assessment group" made by the U.S. forces' side at the last round of the contact as a politically motivated provocation as it wantonly infringes upon the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK in disregard of international law including the United Nations Charter and brigandish sophism running diametrically counter to the provisions of the Armistice Agreement.
					
					 The U.S. forces side came out with an absurd proposal on allowing to inspect the military base of the DPRK to counter its proposal for inspecting objects directly related to the "Cheonan" case such as the already disclosed scene of the case and material evidence, the DPRK side said, and continued:
					
					 As far as the inspection of the military bases is concerned, this logic of the U.S. forces side means calling for inspecting before any others not only the U.S. military bases in Ryongsan, Osan, Kunsan and other places in south Korea where large-scale frantic nuclear war exercises are staged against the DPRK before and after the "Cheonan" case but also the U.S. Forces Command, a center for fabrications and plots. 
					
					 In a nutshell, the proposal of the U.S. forces side is nothing but a sinister intention to deliberately link the "Cheonan" case with the DPRK, justify its reckless hostile acts under the pretence of it and put brake on probing the truth behind the case.
					
					 What is the most urgent and important matter in settling the case is to give precedence to the field investigation by an inspection group of the DPRK National Defence Commission, the DPRK side stressed, pointing to the following reasons:
					
					 Firstly, the DPRK intends to dispatch the inspection group of its National Defence Commission because the U.S. forces side groundlessly links the DPRK with the warship case in collusion with the south Korean puppet group.
					
					 Should the U.S. forces side talk nonsense, the DPRK side would not have called for the field survey of the inspection group of the NDC from the outset.
					
					 Secondly, the "results of investigation", a product of conspiracy and tie-up between the U.S. and the south Korean puppet group, are beset with doubts as they are unilateral and unscientific.
					
					 Thirdly, the demand for investigation by the NDC inspection group fully conforms with the agenda of the DPRK-U.S. military general-level talks.
					
					 Both sides adopted "On clarifying the truth about the 'Cheonan' warship case on an objective and scientific basis" as the agenda of the talks.
					
					 The DPRK side cited detailed facts to condemn the U.S. forces side for kicking up a racket of reckless military confrontation aimed at wrecking  peace and stability in the Korean Peninsula and its vicinity under the pretext of the said case. And it warned that the army and people of the DPRK will take stronger counteraction unless the U.S. forces side stops military provocations against it.
					
					 The DPRK side declared that the U.S. forces side's persistent hindrance to the field investigation by the NDC inspection group and its insistence on the DPRK's involvement in the "Cheonan" case would harden the steadfast determination of the army and people of the DPRK to probe the truth about the case to the last.
					
					 Both sides agreed to hold the fourth round of the DPRK-U.S. senior colonel-level military working contact for probing the truth about the "Cheonan" case in Panmunjom around August 9.

articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop Meets Chinese Assistant to FM
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Chinese Assistant to FM
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with Hu Zhengyue, assistant to the foreign minister of China, and his party at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Friday when the latter paid a courtesy call on him.

articles.title: 60th Anniversary of Choe Chun Guk's Death Commemorated
articles.content:
60th Anniversary of Choe Chun Guk's Death Commemorated
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- A national memorial service took place at the Central Youth Hall Friday to commemorate the 60th anniversary of death of Choe Chun Guk, revolutionary fighter.
					 Present there were senior Party, army and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army, bereaved family members, persons of merit and working people in the city.
					
					 Choe had the great honor of being a member of the party in October, Juche 19 (1930) thanks to the deep political trust of President Kim Il Sung. After joining the Anti-Japanese People's Guerrilla Army in the spring of 1932 he displayed matchless courage and performed heroic feats in every battle as a squad leader and company political commissar and then as regiment commander and political commissar of an independent brigade. After the liberation of the country, too, he devotedly worked for the founding of the party and the building of regular revolutionary armed forces in hearty response to the line of building a new country set forth by the President. During the hard-fought Fatherland Liberation War he fought heroically for the victory in the war as a divisional commander. He died a heroic death in the battle for the liberation of Andong on July 30, 1950.   
					
					 Choe Thae Bok, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, said in his memorial address that Choe Chun Guk made a great contribution to the liberation of the country and the defence of the national sovereignty. He was a genuine Juche type revolutionary fighter and an able military and political cadre who displayed his noble ideological and moral traits which everybody should learn from in the intense loyalty to the leader of the revolution, firm faith in the victory of the revolution, high qualifications, devotion to the country and the people and indomitable fighting spirit as a commanding officer, he said, adding:
					
					 Though he passed away so early, this land is now witnessing the great heyday of prosperity under the wise leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il as desired by the anti-Japanese revolutionary martyrs in their lifetime.
					
					 Thanks to the profound loving care and sense of obligation of the great persons of Mt. Paektu Choe's life and exploits are shining long along with the glorious history of the Songun revolution and his noble revolutionary spirit and feats powerfully encourage the servicepersons and people in their dynamic advance for the victory in the drive for building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid before Bust of Choe Chun Guk
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid before Bust of Choe Chun Guk
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the bust of revolutionary martyr Choe Chun Guk at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong on Friday on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of his death.
					 Seen there was a wreath from General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were Yang Hyong Sop and officials of party, armed forces and power organs, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons, members of the bereaved family and officials and working people here. 
					
					 Placed before the bust were wreaths in the name of the WPK Central Committee, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of Foreign Trade, party and power organs in the city and others.
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute to Choe Chun Guk who dedicated his all to the struggle for the liberation of the country and freedom and happiness of the people.

articles.title: Gift from Russian Political Figure
articles.content:
Gift from Russian Political Figure
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the first secretary of the Irkutsk Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation on the occasion of the 57th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The gift was handed over to a DPRK official concerned working in Khabarovsk.

articles.title: Birthday of CPLA Observed
articles.content:
Birthday of CPLA Observed
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Sun Yanfeng, military, naval and air attache of the Chinese embassy here, arranged a reception at the embassy on Friday to mark the 83rd birthday of the Chinese People's Liberation Army.
					 Present at the reception on invitation were Pak Jae Gyong, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, general officers and other officers of the Korean People's Army, officials concerned and representatives and military attaches of embassies of different countries here.
					
					 Chinese Ambassador Liu Hongcai and his embassy officials were on hand.
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Multipurpose Alarm Developed
articles.content:
Multipurpose Alarm Developed
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- A multipurpose alarm has recently been developed by the Korea Chongchun Trading Company.
					 The invention consists of a main body, a remote controller and heat, gas, infrared ray and magnetism sensors.
					
					 When any sign of danger is sensed, it automatically makes an immediate call to people through recorded phone numbers to prevent possible damages.
					
					 It detects a slight sign of gas leakage and senses heat in the preset temperature between 30 and 60 degrees centigrade.
					
					 The signals between sensors, remote controller and main body are transmitted either with or without wire. The infrared sensor works within 12 meters, while the magnetism sensor gives an alarm signal when a magnet installed on the edge of door is apart more than ten millimeters from the sensor attached to the doorframe.
					
					 The remote controller works within the radius of 150 meters.
					
					 The device, which can be connected with telephone, mobile phone and computer network, is operated by battery.
					
					 Kim Chol Nam, a 28-year-old worker of the Pyongyang Piano J.V. Company, told KCNA it had already been introduced in the company to prove very effective.
					
					 Choe Yong Ik, a 78-year-old resident in Central District, Pyongyang, said the aged and patients staying alone at home could make an emergency call with this system when they need help.
					
					 The patent alarm was developed by Kim Myong Hwa, 46, chief of the IT Interchange Section of the company.

articles.title: US Scheme for Tightening Military Domination Blasted
articles.content:
US Scheme for Tightening Military Domination Blasted
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is nowadays showing an ill-boding military move in the Asia-Pacific region, describing it as one intended to keep "stability and peace" in the region from someone's "threat" and ensure "freedom" of sailing there.
					 This is a wicked trick to justify its criminal military movement and attain its ulterior aims by misleading public opinion, points out Rodong Sinmun Friday in a signed commentary.
					
					 The real intention of the U.S. is evidently to contain big powers by its military upperhand in the Asia-Pacific region and maintain and strengthen the military domination over the region, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. has massed huge armed forces in the Asia-Pacific region. Nevertheless, it continues to deploy military equipment based on up-to-date techniques while intensifying the joint military maneuvers with its followers. Typical of such moves are the RIMPAC joint military exercises and deployment of F-22s in Hawaii. This clearly shows that the U.S. scheme for domination over the region has reached the grave phase.
					
					 The U.S. arms buildup and war exercises in the Asia-Pacific region pose a threat to the countries in this region including China.
					
					 The U.S. cooked up an anti-DPRK farce with south Korean puppet authorities and has recently conducted the largest scale nuclear war exercises with it as a pretext. This is an extremely dangerous military provocation and adventure as it is intended to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 It is anachronistic fancy for the U.S. to dominate the region by military strength. The U.S. should squarely look into the reality and renounce its criminal scheme to maintain and strengthen the military domination in the region.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Personnel Replacement Assailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Personnel Replacement Assailed
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group recently replaced chief secretaries of "Chongwadae" by new ones, describing them as "those who can have good understanding with the people" and "persons fit for leading the change desired by the people". This is nothing but sheer sophism mocking at the people's mindset, says Minju Joson Friday in a signed commentary.
					 Lee's replacement of the chief secretaries by his confidants is aimed to neither promote "understanding with the people" nor bring about "any change desired by the people" but to weather ever-worsening ruling crisis, the commentary notes, and goes on;
					
					 In the first year of its office the group of traitors encountered one million-strong candlelight demonstration and the following year it was deluged with "declarations on the situation" unprecedented in the history of south Korea .This year it faced a stern punishment by the people in the "elections to the local self-governing bodies." As a result, the theory of "reshuffle" openly came to the fore within the group of traitors. The above-said reshuffle is aimed at ensuring "stability in the latter half of its office" as it is a product of its serious ruling crisis.
					
					 It is the only recipe for tiding over the daily aggravating ruling crisis to make a fundamental switchover in the traitorous, unpopular and anti-reunification policy.
					
					 The south Koreans demand a policy switchover rather than reshuffle. Nothing will change no matter how frequently the traitor carries out a reshuffle without making a policy switchover.
					
					 The south Koreans' anti-Lee Myung Bak struggle will escalate, deepening the ruling crisis unless the present policies are rolled back.

articles.title: Increased Role of Women Called for
articles.content:
Increased Role of Women Called for
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday in an editorial dedicated to the 64th anniversary of the promulgation of the Law on Sex Equality calls upon all the women to fully display their high revolutionary spirit and indomitable mettle in the on-going worthwhile advance for a great surge to win the final victory in the building of a thriving nation, single-mindedly united around General Secretary Kim Jong Il. 
					 Noting that the promulgation of the law by President Kim Il Sung on July 30, Juche 35 (1946) was a great event which brought about a revolutionary change in the position of the Korean women and in their socio-political life, the editorial goes on:
					
					 The Juche-oriented women's movement pioneered by the President has greeted a shining heyday under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Korean women are firmly confident that Kim Jong Il is a symbol of all victories and that their worthwhile life and future lie in remaining true to the Songun leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea. They are devoting themselves, fully aware that they are proud militant ranks standing shoulder to shoulder with men on the front of the Songun revolution. This is the noble spiritual world of the Korean women.
					
					 The day is drawing near when Songun Korea will greet the emergence of a thriving nation with fireworks as the Korean women, who account for half of the country's population, are bringing about miracles and innovations in different parts of the country alongside the men, true to the party's idea of effecting a great surge. 
					
					 Korean-style socialism remains strong and the society is pervaded with fragrant scent of beautiful life thanks to the trustworthy Korean women dynamically pushing one of the wheels of the revolutionary chariot, always remaining faithful to the party. 
					
					 The editorial calls on all the women to bear deep in mind the great honor and happiness of holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem as their leader and father and fully display their revolutionary spirit in the on-going general offensive to significantly greet the conference of the party and its 65th founding anniversary.

articles.title: Abolition of AA Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Abolition of AA Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration of south Korea on Tuesday released a statement titled "Abolish Armistice Agreement and Conclude Peace Treaty."
					 The statement accused the United States of having increased the danger of a war on the Korean Peninsula since the signing of the AA in wanton violation of it.
					
					 The situation on the peninsula is so tense that a war may break out any moment, it said, denouncing the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak regime for kicking off the largest-ever joint naval exercises for aggression against the DPRK in the East Sea of Korea.
					
					 It termed the joint military exercises dangerous war moves which might wreck the peace and stability in the Korean Peninsula and Northeast Asia and, moreover, spark off a new big war.
					
					 It stressed the need to abolish the AA, build a peace-keeping mechanism on the Korean Peninsula and thoroughly implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration for the purpose of achieving the independent reunification, peace and prosperity of the nation.
					
					 It demanded the United States and the Lee Myung Bak regime stop at once the joint military exercises threatening peace and opt for settling the issue through dialogue.

articles.title: US-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises Flailed
articles.content:
US-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises Flailed
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The "Joint Action for Probe into the Truth about Warship 'Cheonan' Case and Peace on the Korean Peninsula" of south Korea grouping at least 40 civic and public organizations held a candlelight rally in Seoul on Tuesday denouncing the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers for staging their dangerous joint naval exercises.
					 At the rally speakers expressed irrepressible resentment at the fact that the criminals who should be responsible for the "Cheonan" case are shamelessly blocking the probe into the truth about the case and kicking up a racket for a war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 They noted that the joint naval exercises are, to all intents and purposes, war maneuvers aimed at mounting a preemptive strike at the DPRK in view of their scale, nature, etc.
					
					 The said exercises in which even the Japan "Self-Defense Forces" are participating under the cloak of "visitors", in particular, once again lay bare the true colors of the Lee Myung Bak forces as bellicose elements, sycophants and traitors pushing forward the formation of the "triangular military alliance", they charged.
					
					 They stressed that they would struggle to the last against the joint military exercises of the warmongers further aggravating the situation on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 That day the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification staged a demonstration condemning the joint military exercises before the puppet Ministry of National Defense and the south Korea-U.S. "Combined Forces Command".

articles.title: Anniversary of Korean Victory Day Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korean Victory Day Observed
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Switzerland, a seminar in France, a lecture in Democratic Congo, a photo exhibition in Nigeria, a film show in South Africa and a lecture and a film show in Indonesia between July 17 and 27 to mark the 57th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Displayed in their venues were works of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and photos showing their Songun leadership exploits.
					
					 Appreciated at the film shows were Korean films.
					
					 Speeches were made at the events.
					
					 The chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee noted that under the distinguished leadership of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung the Korean people defeated the U.S. imperialists and won a shinning victory in the three-year Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 Today the DPRK has turned into an impregnable stronghold thanks to the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il and the unity and cohesion of the party, the army and the people closely rallied around the leader, he said.
					
					 The chief of the French Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Idea said it would have been unthinkable without the extraordinary commanding art of Kim Il Sung that the DPRK reduced to submission the U.S. which boasted of being the "strongest" in the world.
					
					 The chairman of the Group for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea of Democratic Congo said that the army and people of the DPRK inflicted a bitter defeat upon the U.S. imperialists by fighting heroically, united as one around Kim Il Sung. The Korean people's brilliant victory was entirely attributable to his gifted military strategy and tactics and wise leadership, he said.
					
					 A message of greetings to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting in Switzerland.

articles.title: US Hostile Policy toward DPRK Slammed
articles.content:
US Hostile Policy toward DPRK Slammed
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Political parties of Bangladesh denounced the U.S. for its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					 Expressing deep concern about the situation of the Korean Peninsula growing acute day by day due to the unjust hostile policy toward the DPRK on the part of the U.S. and its followers, the Workers' Party of Bangladesh said in its statement on July 23:
					
					 The U.S. moves to stifle the DPRK and its nuclear blackmail compelled the latter to have access to the nuclear deterrent.
					
					 It is legitimate right for the DPRK to employ all means to defend the sovereignty of the country from the U.S. military threat getting evermore undisguised with each passing day.
					
					 The U.S. should pull all its aggression armed forces out of south Korea and immediately drop its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The Communist Party of Bangladesh (Marxist-Leninist) in its statement on July 24 said, recalling that the U.S. unleashed a war of aggression against the young DPRK in June 1950:
					
					 Today the U.S. imperialists are getting hell-bent again on the scheme for another war of aggression in a bid to make up for their defeat in the last Korean War.
					
					 We express firm solidarity with the Korean people in their struggle to defend the sovereignty of the country, regarding as legitimate the measures for self-defence taken by the DPRK in recent years.
					
					 Meanwhile, Ibrahim Eisam Lary, general-secretary of the Arab Lawyers Union, in a statement on July 22 charged that the U.S. is persistently working to stifle socialist Korea in the same gangster-like manner as was seen 60 years ago, instead of drawing due lesson from the shameless defeat it suffered in the Korean War.

articles.title: Statement of NDC Spokesman Supported in Britain
articles.content:
Statement of NDC Spokesman Supported in Britain
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on July 24 in support of the statement issued by a spokesman for the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 The DPRK was entirely just when it took a measure for self-defense to cope with the evermore undisguised racket of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet authorities for sanctions against the DPRK to stifle its socialist system and the frantic provocations, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces are mulling staging all sorts of madcap war maneuvers for invading the DPRK including the joint naval exercises, the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint drills and the joint anti-submarine drills.
					
					 These war maneuvers are a wanton challenge to the peace, a grave infringement upon the sovereignty of the DPRK and despicable moves to suffocate the Korean-style socialism which has provided the Korean people with an independent and creative life.
					
					 We fully support the statement issued by a spokesman for the DPRK National Defence Commission, clarifying that the army and people of the DPRK will start a sacred retaliatory war to protect the nation's interests.

articles.title: Story of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Story of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- One day in January Juche 40 (1951), President Kim Il Sung visited a factory.
					 The war-stricken factory was lacking technicians and skilled workers.
					
					 Being briefed on the situation of the factory he told its officials that the factory should train technicians and skilled hands by itself and that, to this end, it should have its own college.
					
					 He then indicated ways of founding a college in the factory.
					
					 He said that in the future some servicepersons, including those who had worked with the factory, would be recalled from the front and sent to universities or colleges but for the present a study-while-working system should be established in the factory.
					
					 On his instructions, a college came into being in the factory in July that year.

articles.title: Tercer contacto de trabajo militar entre RPDC y EE.UU.
articles.content:
Tercer contacto de trabajo militar entre RPDC y EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 30 de julio (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 30 en Phanmunjom el tercer contacto de trabajo militar a nivel de primer coronel entre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Estados Unidos de America para aclarar los verdaderos aspectos del caso de hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana "Cheonan".
					 La parte coreana aclaro que la misma propuesta del "grupo de valoracion conjunta" presentada por la parte de las tropas norteamericanas en el segundo contacto es la provocacion politica que viola flagrantemente la soberania y la dignidad de la RPDC sin hacer caso omiso de la Carta de la ONU y otras leyes internacionales y lo bandidesco que contraviene gravemente a la demanda del Acuerdo de Armisticio de Corea. 
					
					Subrayo que a la propuesta de la parte coreana de investigar los objetos relacionados directamente con el incidente del "Cheonan" incluyendo el lugar del incidente y los datos materiales ya publicados, la parte norteamericana le enfrenta con la propuesta absurda demandando el permiso de la inspeccion sobre la base militar de la RPDC, y enfatizo:
					
					Al hablar de la inspeccion de la base militar, deberan someterse antes que nada a la inspeccion las bases de Ryongsan, Osan, Kunsan, etc. de las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea en las que en los periodos anterior y posterior al incidente del "Cheonan" se efectuaron los ejercicios de guerra nuclear de gran envergadura contra la RPDC y la comandancia de las tropas norteamericanas, base principal de invencion e intrigas.
					
					En una palabra, la propuesta de la parte norteamericana no pasa de ser un intento malsano para vincular de manera coercitiva el incidente del "Cheonan" con la RPDC, racionalizar los imprudentes actos hostiles a esta que se perpetran tomandolo como pretexto y dar freno a los esfuerzos por esclarecer los verdaderos aspectos del incidente.
					
					La parte coreana senalo que dar prioridad a la investigacion sobre el terreno del grupo de inspeccion del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC es el problema mas apremiante e importante en la solucion del caso y declaro su razon como sigue:
					
					Primero, es porque el intento de enviar ese grupo al lugar del caso se debe a que la parte de las tropas norteamericanas relaciona de manera coercitiva la RPDC con el caso del hundimiento del buque de guerra en contubernio con los titeres surcoreanos.
					
					Si la parte norteamericana no hubiera presentado tal insistencia absurda, la parte coreana no habria insistido desde el principio en la averiguacion del citado grupo sobre el terreno.
					
					Segundo, es porque el "resultado de investigacion" presentado por EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos esta lleno de las sospechas unilaterales y no cientificas. 
					
					Tercero, es porque el problema de la averiguacion del grupo de inspeccion del CDN de la RPDC conviene enteramente a la agenda de las conversaciones militares a nivel de general entre la RPDC y EE.UU.
					
					Ambas partes definieron la agenda como "Para aclarar de manera objetiva y cientifica los verdaderos aspectos del caso del buque 'Cheonan'".
					
					La parte de la RPDC revelo con los datos detallados que bajo el pretexto del caso del "Cheonan" la parte de las tropas estadounidenses recurre en estos dias a la imprudente campana de confrontacion militar que destruye la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno y le advirtio que si ella no cesa de perpetrar la provocacion militar contra la RPDC, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea tomaran la mas poderosa contramedida.
					
					Cuanto mas la parte de las tropas yanquis impide la inspeccion sobre el terreno del grupo de inspeccion del CDN y relaciona el caso de "Cheonan" con la RPDC, tanto mas se hara firme la voluntad del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea de aclarar hasta el fin la veracidad del caso, enfatizo.
					
					Ambas partes acordaron efectuar a eso del 9 de agosto en Phanmunjom el cuarto contacto de trabajo militar a nivel de primer coronel para aclarar los verdaderos aspectos del caso de "Cheonan".

articles.title: Acto central por el 60o aniversario de fallecimiento de Choe Chun Guk
articles.content:
Acto central por el 60o aniversario de fallecimiento de Choe Chun Guk
Pyongyang, 30 de julio (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 30 en la Casa Central de la Juventud el acto central por el 60o aniversario del fallecimiento del combatiente revolucionario Choe Chun Guk. 
					 En el acto participaron los cuadros del partido, el ejercito y el Estado, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, las entidades sociales, los ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, los familiares de Choe, benemeritos y trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					 Gracias a la gran confianza politica del Presidente Kim Il Sung, Choe obtuvo en octubre del 19 (1930) de la Era Juche el noble honor del militante del partido e ingreso en primavera de 1932 en la Guerrilla Popular Antijaponesa. El trabajo de jefe de escuadra, instructor politico de compania, jefe de regimiento y comisario politico de brigada independiente y realizo en los combates los meritos heroicos dando pruebas de toda su valentia.
					
					Despues de la liberacion de la patria, lucho con abnegacion por la fundacion del partido y la construccion de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias regulares en acato a la linea de construccion de la nueva patria, presentada por el Presidente. En el periodo de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, siendo jefe de division, lucho heroicamente por el triunfo de la guerra y cayo el 30 de julio de 1950 en la batalla de liberacion de Andong.
					
					  El miembro suplente del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Thae Bok, en sus palabras de recordacion, dijo que Choe hizo gran aporte a la lucha por lograr la liberacion de la patria y defender la soberania de la nacion.
					
					Y agrego que el fue el combatiente revolucionario de tipo jucheano y competente funcionario politico-militar quien mostro los nobles rasgos ideo-espirituales que deben aprender todos tanto en la infinita fidelidad al lider de la revolucion y la firme conviccion en el triunfo de la revolucion como la capacidad excepcional de comandante, el espiritu de servicio abnegado a la patria y el pueblo y el indoblegable espiritu de lucha. 
					
					  Aunque Choe cayo ya hace mucho tiempo, en esta tierra patria se abre la era de prosperidad de la patria, bajo la sabia direccion del Dirigente, como lo deseaban en su vida los martires revolucionarios antijaponeses, apunto.
					
					  Gracias al noble amor y obligacion moral de los grandes hombres del monte Paektu, la vida y las proezas de Choe brillan eternamente junto con la orgullosa historia de la revolucion del Songun, dijo y recalco que su noble espiritu revolucionario y hazanas dan gran estimulo a la lucha del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea que avanzan a pasos firmes por el triunfo de la gran potencia prospera.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena absurdo intento de EE.UU. en Asia y Pacifico
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena absurdo intento de EE.UU. en Asia y Pacifico
Pyongyang, 30 de julio (ATCC) -- Estados Unidos muestra insolitos movimientos militares en la region de Asia y el Pacifico y lo describe como actividades para defender la "estabilidad y la paz" desde la "amenaza" de alguien y asegurar la "libertad" de la navegacion en esa region.
					 Esto deviene siniestra artimana tendente a racionalizar sus alborotos militares y realizar el malsano objeto induciendo en error la opinion publica.
					
					 Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 30 y continua:
					
					  Es decir, EE.UU. tiende a mantener a raya con la supremacia militar a las potencias en Asia y el Pacifico y sustentar el dominio militar en esta region.
					
					 Ya ha concentrado ahi las enormes fuerzas armadas, pero, sigue emplazando los equipos militares dotados de las tecnicas sofisticadas y fortalece los ejercicios militares conjuntos con las fuerzas satelites. Lo testimonian  el ejercicio militar conjunto "Rimpac" y el emplazamiento de los cazas "F-22" en Hawai.
					
					  Esto demuestra patentemente que llegan a la etapa grave las maniobras de ese imperio para establecer el dominio sobre la region en cuestion.
					
					  Tal aumento armamentista y ejercicios belicos devienen amenaza a China y otros paises de dicha region.
					
					  Recientemente, EE.UU., en contubernio con los titeres surcoreanos, invento un incidente intrigante contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y desarrollo ejercicios de guerra nuclear de gran envergadura sin precedente en la historia so pretexto de ese caso, lo cual es la provocacion y aventura militares muy peligrosas para aplastar la RPDC.
					
					  EE.UU. trata de dominar con la fuerza militar la region de Asia y el Pacifico, lo cual es la ilusion anacronica.
					
					  Debe ver correctamente la realidad y abandonar su intento criminal de fortalecer el dominio militar en dicha region.

articles.title: Minju Joson comenta sustitucion de lacayos de Chongwadae
articles.content:
Minju Joson comenta sustitucion de lacayos de Chongwadae
Pyongyang, 30 de julio (ATCC) -- En estos dias, la banda de Lee Myung Bak sustituyo a los secretarios-jefes de "Chongwadae" (Casa Azul) y lo embellece como "personas adecuadas a la voluntad de los habitantes" y "las apropiadas a dirigir el cambio que quieren ellos". Esto es burla a la opinion publica.
					Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual difundido este viernes y continua:
					
					Tal sustitucion de subordinados fieles no es para "tener comprension mutua con los habitantes" o traer el "cambio que quieren ellos" sino para salvar la crisis de domino que se torna cada vez mas grave.
					
					En el primer ano de su mandato, la banda traidora sufrio la manifestacion con velas encendidas de un millon personas, en el segundo ano, estuvo en aprietos por las "declaraciones sobre la situacion" sin precedentes y este ano fue castigado severamente por los habitantes en las "elecciones de autonomia local". E incluso se presento en el seno la teoria de "reforma del personal". Por lo tanto, la sustitucion de los subordinados fieles se debio a la grave crisis de dominio y se necesito para la "estabilidad de la segunda mitad de su mandato".
					
					Para evadir la crisis de dominio que se torna cada dia mas grave, es preciso cambiar radicalmente la politica contra la nacion, el pueblo y la reunificacion.
					
					Ahora, los habitantes surcoreanos no demandan la sustitucion de los lacayos sino el cambio de la politica. Mientras no cambia la politica, se fortalecera mas la lucha anti-Lee Myung Bak de los habitantes surcoreanos y se agravara la crisis de dominio.
